entries.title: In Hell: A Cyberpunk Thriller, Dennis Hopper played a porn baron who dressed like a Pentium
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

entries.title: You can play Flight Simulator inside Flight Simulator now
entries.description: MS Flight Simulator's latest update invites you to relive four flight simulators from the 1980s.

entries.title: Games Workshop has released a Christmas single sung by an ork
entries.description: I'm dreaming of a green Christmas.

entries.title: PvPvE shooter Scavengers will shut down without ever leaving Early Access
entries.description: The game has changed developers since a May 2021 launch.

entries.title: European Union official swamped by console warriors after joking about Call of Duty exclusivity
entries.description: PC Gamer reiterates its longstanding neutrality in the console wars.

entries.title: Today's Wordle answer and hint for Saturday, November 12
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #511 puzzle.

entries.title: Dave Bautista auditions for the Gears live-action movie on Twitter: 'I can't make this any easier'
entries.description: Bautista's enthusiasm for the role of Marcus Fenix has not diminished.

entries.title: This tool uses machine learning to animate 3D models on-the-fly, and it's getting Unreal Engine support soon
entries.description: Anything World launched this week, with a free version for student and personal use.
